job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtTitle Software EngineerltpgtltpgtLocation Sunnyvale CalifornialtpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtJob Description ltpgtltpgtAs a Software Engineer in the Engineering Department your primary responsibilities will include working side by side with RampampD and 3rd party vender on the development of new automated test equipment You will be expected to demonstrated an excellent working knowledge of CC programming developing application and automating tool per product required You are a selfmotivated professional who demonstrates the ability to quickly grasp new technologies products and use casesltpgtltpgtResponsibilities will includeltpgtltulgtltligtParticipate in product functional system architecture and design reviewltligtltligtCollaborate effectively with peers and venders to solve complex problems deliver endtoend quality in our product and customer experienceltligtltligtTriage customer issues and find timely creative solution to customer problemsltligtltligtExecute test cases analyze and report test results to internal RampampD or vendersltligtltligtWrite API and feature documentationltligtltulgtltpgtRequired qualificationsltpgtltulgtltligtBSMS in Computer Science or equivalent experienceltligtltligt2 year working experience on WindowsLinux SW development with strong debugging skillsltligtltligtHave strong programming skills on C Java Python etcltligtltligtKnowledge of cloudbased services or imaging process will be preferredltligtltligtStrong collaboration and communication skillsltligtltligtStrong initiative and ability to work independentlyampnbspltligtltulgt
